hymn.title: Take the name of Jesus with you
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By the Lord's Name

layout.singingstanza: Take the name of Je -- sus with you, Child of sor -- row and of woe; It will joy and com -- fort give you, Take it then wher -- e'er you go. Pre -- cious name! Oh, how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of heav'n; Pre -- cious name! Oh, how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of heav'n.

lyrics.stanza: Take the name of Jesus with you, Child of sorrow and of woe; It will joy and comfort give you, Take it then where'er you go.
Precious name! Oh, how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of heav'n; Precious name! Oh, how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of heav'n.
Take the name of Jesus ever, As a shield from every snare. If temptations round you gather, Breathe that holy name in prayer.
Oh, the precious name of Jesus, How it thrills our souls with joy; All the favor of the Father In this name we may enjoy.
At the name of Jesus bowing, Falling prostrate at His feet, Claim His vict'ry over evil And the enemy defeat.
